resources.string: Enter the Your Email to Reset Your Password!
You\'ve unlocked a 30-day free trial. After 30 days, your subscription will automatically switch to a paid plan for 10 USD per month.
Get Started with Your Free Trial!
Your subscription has expired and you can no longer access your account. Upgrade now to continue enjoying the full experience for only 10 USD per month.
Are you sure you want to save?
Are you sure you want to logout?

To reactivate your account, please follow these steps:

1. Visit the nearest OMT location.
2. Provide the following details:
 - Your ID
 - First Name
 - Last Name
 - Amount: 10 USD
3. Transfer the amount to this phone number: +96170123456.
4. Collect the receipt after the transaction.
5. Locate the LTN (Local Transfer Number) on the receipt. It's a 12-digit code.
6. Open the app and Press the 'Pay' button.
7. Enter the following details:
 - LTN
 - First Name
 - Last Name
8. Your account will be unblocked upon successful completion.

Thank you for your cooperation.

To reactivate your account, please follow these steps:

1. Visit the nearest WHISH location.
2. Provide the following details:
 - Your ID
 - First Name
 - Last Name
 - Amount: 10 USD
3. Transfer the amount to this phone number: +96170123456.
4. Collect the receipt after the transaction.
5. Locate the LTN (Local Transfer Number) on the receipt. It's a 12-digit code.
6. Open the app and Press the 'Pay' button.
7. Enter the following details:
 - LTN
 - First Name
 - Last Name
8. Your account will be unblocked upon successful completion.

Thank you for your cooperation.
